sentences.sContent: Standing on the floor, a young boarder named Carl was admiring the view.
sentences.sContent_eng: Standing on the floor, a young boarder named Carl was admiring the view.
sentences.sCn: 一位名叫卡尔的寄宿生站在地上，为该情景钦佩不已。

sentences.sContent: 'There are a couple of rumours I would like to quash, ' says a boarder while Kate was there who knew her well.
sentences.sContent_eng: 'There are a couple of rumours I would like to quash, ' says a boarder while Kate was there who knew her well.
sentences.sCn: 有一些谣言传闻什么的，我都想替她抱不平。“一位比较了解凯特的寄宿生如是说。

synos.tran: 寄膳者；寄膳宿者；寄宿生

remMethod.val: 来自board(n. 膳食； v. 寄宿)

words.tran: 用木板遮住；收费为…供膳（board的ing形式）
上（飞机、车、船等）；用板盖上；给提供膳宿

trans.tranOther: a student who stays at a school during the night, as well as during the day
